CARD_TEXT.S:
[Default Action]

Make an engagement. You may declare this Engagement to be of any one Virtue, and Surge it with Focus of that Virtue if the Weaver allows.

CARD_TIP.S: Default action. Engage, and declare Virtue of the engagement.

CARD_TEXT.S:
[Default Action]

Move from your current zone to an adjacent zone.

CARD_TIP.S: Default action. Move one zone.

CARD_TEXT.S:
[Default Action]

Heal one ally.

CARD_TIP.S: Default action. Heal one ally.

CARD_TEXT.S:
[Default Action]

Prep this action: If a foe engages you, you must use this prepped action to grant yourself +1 Composure against that engagement.

CARD_TIP.S: Default action. Prep: If a foe engages you, you must grant yourself +1 Composure against that engagement.

CARD_TEXT.S:
Before engaging, you may Hustle.

After engaging, you may choose a hero in a zone adjacent to yours, and Hustle that hero into your zone.

CARD_TIP.S: Before engaging, Hustle self. After engaging, Hustle ally to you.

CARD_TEXT.S:
Engage with +2.

After engaging: The target gains +2 Force until the beginning of your next turn.

CARD_TIP.S: Engage with +2. Foe gains +2 Force.

CARD_TEXT.S: The next engagement you make this turn gains +1 Range.

CARD_TIP.S: The next engagement you make this turn gains +1 Range.

CARD_TEXT.S: Prep this action: After any character you can sense rolls an engagement, you may use this prep to force them to reroll their engagement and keep the new result.

CARD_TIP.S: Prep: Force any character to reroll engagement.

CARD_TEXT.S:
Choose an ally. You may end any one status on that ally.

Heal.

CARD_TIP.S: End status on one ally, then Heal them.

CARD_TEXT.S:
Engage with +1 Range.

After engaging, Hustle the target closer to you.

CARD_TIP.S: Engage with +1 Range. Hustle target toward you.

CARD_TEXT.S:
[Primary Compassion]

(Calling ability: OPE, No Action)

Use this ability when an ally rolls a 1 when making an engagement.

Roll a d6, and add the result to the triggering ally's Force for this engagement.

CARD_TIP.S: When engaging ally rolls 1, add 1d6.

CARD_TEXT.S: Engage your target. The next time your target engages before the start of your next turn, prevent all non-damage effects of the engagement.

CARD_TIP.S: Engage. Prevent non-damage effects of target's next engagement.

CARD_TEXT.S: Heal an ally. That ally gains +3 Composure for the next engagement against them before your next turn.

CARD_TIP.S: Heal an ally. They get +3 Composure.

CARD_TEXT.S: Spend any amount of Morale, and choose another hero that can sense you. The chosen hero gains a bonus to Composure until the start of your next turn. The bonus is four times the amount of Morale you spent.

CARD_TIP.S: Spend your Morale to give an ally +4 Composure per Morale spent.

CARD_TEXT.S: Until the beginning of your next turn, you gain an Aura: Heroes in your zone gain +2 Composure.

CARD_TIP.S: Until the start of your next turn, heroes in your zone have +2 Composure.

CARD_TEXT.S:
[Secondary Compassion]

(Calling ability: OPE, No Action)

Use this ability when a foe engages an ally you can see.

Roll a d6, and add the result to the triggering ally's Composure against this engagement.

CARD_TIP.S: When ally engaged, grant +1d6 Composure.

CARD_TEXT.S:
[Clever/Courage Calling]

After engaging, you may Hustle any character in an adjacent zone into your zone, and then you may Hustle any character in your zone (including yourself) out of the zone.

CARD_TIP.S: After engaging, Hustle someone into zone, then Hustle someone out of zone.

CARD_TEXT.S:
[Courage/Courage Calling]

You gain a bonus to this engagement equal to the base Force bonus of the target foe.

CARD_TIP.S: Gain bonus equal to foe's Force bonus.

CARD_TEXT.S: Engage. If you use this technique against a foe that has triggered one of your prep actions during this encounter, then you gain an extra +1 Force for each Focus you spend to Surge.

CARD_TIP.S: If you engage a foe who's triggered your prep, +1 per Surge.

CARD_TEXT.S:
[Primary Courage]

(Calling ability: OPE, No Action)

Use this ability when you would be able to use a hasten action.

Hustle.

CARD_TIP.S: During your turn, Hustle yourself.

CARD_TEXT.S:
[Secondary Clever]

(Calling ability: OPE, No Action)

You may use this ability when your turn begins, and another character could act instead.

The turn is passed to a valid character of your choice instead of you.

CARD_TIP.S: When turn is passed to you, pass to another instead.

CARD_TEXT.S:
Hustle.

If there are no heroes or foes in your new zone, Hustle again.

If there is at least one foe in your new zone, regain one Morale.

CARD_TIP.S: Hustle, then Hustle again if new zone empty.

CARD_TEXT.S:
Engage.

After engaging, you may Heal an ally, with Heal +1.

CARD_TIP.S: Engage, then Heal with +1 Heal.

CARD_TEXT.S:
This engagement deals half damage (round up).

After engaging: Choose another hero. They gain a bonus to their next engagement before your next turn, equal to 4 times the damage dealt with this engagement.

CARD_TIP.S: Deal half damage. Give ally Force bonus equal to 4 times damage dealt.
